Name: Kart kids
About the game: Kart kids is a chaotic racing game, up to 60 tiny karts race each other in the local neighbourhood! Features 10-30 minutes of playtime. Race against a ton of other small karts! Local multiplayer for up to 2 players. Cool physics, soothing pastel colours. Set the amount of karts and laps to your own liking. The racers wear cool hats. Controls Arrow keys to drive (WASD keys for player 2). Arrow keys and Return key to navigate the menu. Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
